description: Gets an Amazon Q in Connect AI Agent.

parameters.name: assistantId
parameters.description: The identifier of the Amazon Q in Connect assistant. Can be either the ID or the ARN. URLs cannot contain the ARN.

parameters.name: aiAgentId
parameters.description: The identifier of the Amazon Q in Connect AI Agent (with or without a version qualifier). Can be either the ID or the ARN. URLs cannot contain the ARN.

nested_items.name: assistantId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the Amazon Q in Connect assistant. Can be either the ID or the ARN. URLs cannot contain the ARN.

nested_items.name: assistantArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon Q in Connect assistant.

nested_items.name: aiAgentId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the AI Agent.

nested_items.name: aiAgentArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the AI agent.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the AI Agent.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of the AI Agent.

nested_items.name: configuration
nested_items.description: Configuration for the AI Agent.

nested_items.name: manualSearchAIAgentConfiguration
nested_items.description: The configuration for AI Agents of type MANUAL_SEARCH.

nested_items.name: answerGenerationAIPromptId
nested_items.description: The AI Prompt identifier for the Answer Generation prompt used by the MANUAL_SEARCH AI Agent.

nested_items.name: answerGenerationAIGuardrailId
nested_items.description: The AI Guardrail identifier for the Answer Generation guardrail used by the MANUAL_SEARCH AI Agent.

nested_items.name: associationConfigurations
nested_items.description: The association configurations for overriding behavior on this AI Agent.

nested_items.name: associationId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the association for this Association Configuration.

nested_items.name: associationType
nested_items.description: The type of the association for this Association Configuration.

nested_items.name: associationConfigurationData
nested_items.description: The data of the configuration for an Amazon Q in Connect Assistant Association.

nested_items.name: knowledgeBaseAssociationConfigurationData
nested_items.description: The data of the configuration for a KNOWLEDGE_BASE type Amazon Q in Connect Assistant Association.

nested_items.name: contentTagFilter
nested_items.description: An object that can be used to specify Tag conditions.

nested_items.name: tagCondition
nested_items.description: A leaf node condition which can be used to specify a tag condition.

nested_items.name: key
nested_items.description: The tag key in the tag condition.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The tag value in the tag condition.

nested_items.name: andConditions
nested_items.description: A list of conditions which would be applied together with an AND condition.

nested_items.name: key
nested_items.description: The tag key in the tag condition.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The tag value in the tag condition.

nested_items.name: orConditions
nested_items.description: A list of conditions which would be applied together with an OR condition.

nested_items.name: andConditions
nested_items.description: A list of conditions which would be applied together with an AND condition.

nested_items.name: key
nested_items.description: The tag key in the tag condition.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The tag value in the tag condition.

nested_items.name: tagCondition
nested_items.description: A leaf node condition which can be used to specify a tag condition.

nested_items.name: key
nested_items.description: The tag key in the tag condition.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The tag value in the tag condition.

nested_items.name: maxResults
nested_items.description: The maximum number of results to return per page.

nested_items.name: overrideKnowledgeBaseSearchType
nested_items.description: The search type to be used against the Knowledge Base for this request. The values can be SEMANTIC which uses vector embeddings or HYBRID which use vector embeddings and raw text.

nested_items.name: locale
nested_items.description: The locale to which specifies the language and region settings that determine the response language for QueryAssistant.

nested_items.name: answerRecommendationAIAgentConfiguration
nested_items.description: The configuration for AI Agents of type ANSWER_RECOMMENDATION.

nested_items.name: intentLabelingGenerationAIPromptId
nested_items.description: The AI Prompt identifier for the Intent Labeling prompt used by the ANSWER_RECOMMENDATION AI Agent.

nested_items.name: queryReformulationAIPromptId
nested_items.description: The AI Prompt identifier for the Query Reformulation prompt used by the ANSWER_RECOMMENDATION AI Agent.

nested_items.name: answerGenerationAIPromptId
nested_items.description: The AI Prompt identifier for the Answer Generation prompt used by the ANSWER_RECOMMENDATION AI Agent.

nested_items.name: answerGenerationAIGuardrailId
nested_items.description: The AI Guardrail identifier for the Answer Generation Guardrail used by the ANSWER_RECOMMENDATION AI Agent.

(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: origin
nested_items.description: Specifies the origin of the AI Agent. SYSTEM for a default AI Agent created by Q in Connect or CUSTOMER for an AI Agent created by calling AI Agent creation APIs.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the AI Agent.

nested_items.name: versionNumber
nested_items.description: The version number of the AI Agent version (returned if an AI Agent version was specified via use of a qualifier for the aiAgentId on the request).
